welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nova Pazova, a charming city known for its rich history and warm hospitality. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all the beauty and culture this city has to offer. Welcome to our little piece of Serbian paradise!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Batajnica Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Batajnica Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Belgrade Nikola Tesla Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.
